description: This file defines an API endpoint for creating a new note, including input validation, generating a unique ID, and storing the note in the event context.

methods.name: default export function
methods.description: Handles HTTP POST requests to create a new note with validation, ID generation, and storage.

ctags.name: body
ctags.pattern: /^  const body = await readBody<{ title: string; content: string }>(event)$/

ctags.name: content
ctags.pattern: /^  const note = { id, title: body.title, content: body.content, createdAt: now, updatedAt: now }$/

ctags.name: createdAt
ctags.pattern: /^  const note = { id, title: body.title, content: body.content, createdAt: now, updatedAt: now }$/

ctags.name: note
ctags.pattern: /^  const note = { id, title: body.title, content: body.content, createdAt: now, updatedAt: now }$/

ctags.name: title
ctags.pattern: /^  const note = { id, title: body.title, content: body.content, createdAt: now, updatedAt: now }$/

ctags.name: updatedAt
ctags.pattern: /^  const note = { id, title: body.title, content: body.content, createdAt: now, updatedAt: now }$/
